soroban.title: What is Soroban?
soroban.desc: Soroban is the Japanese abacus with over 400 years of history. Kids learning Soroban can visualize the abacus in their mind and calculate as fast as a calculator without pen and paper.
soroban.benefit1Desc: Activates both left brain (logic) and right brain (visual)
soroban.benefit2Desc: Add/subtract 2-3 digit numbers in seconds, no pen needed
soroban.benefit3Desc: Pay attention to each step, applies to all subjects
soroban.benefit4Desc: Popular in Japan, Korea, China, Malaysia...
soroban.whySubtitle: You don't need to know Soroban to help your kids learn!
soroban.demoDesc: Click on beads to move them up/down

roadmap.subtitle: From zero to calculating as fast as a calculator!

roadmap.step3Desc: Increase speed and accuracy through drills

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription anytime. Your account will remain active until the end of the billing period.

items.question: What are the free plan limitations?
items.answer: The free plan includes the first 5 lessons and basic exercises. Upgrade to Premium to unlock all content.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and local payment methods for Vietnam users.

village.name: Stage 1: Starter Village
village.subtitle: Getting to know Soroban
village.description: Get familiar with the Soroban abacus - the magical calculating tool!
village.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! Welcome to the Magical Abacus Village! I'm Owl Soro, and I'll guide you to find the Knowledge Treasure! First, let's learn how to use the Soroban - a magical tool for super fast calculations! ü¶â‚ú®
village.storyComplete: Hoo hoo! Excellent! You've mastered how to use Soroban! Now let's enter the Addition Forest - where numbers are waiting to be combined! üåü

forest.name: Stage 2: Addition Forest
forest.subtitle: Learn addition & Small Friends
forest.description: Learn addition and the Small Friends trick (sum of 5)!
forest.storyIntro: Welcome to Addition Forest! üå≤ Here, numbers love being combined together. You'll learn the "Small Friends" trick - a magical addition formula with sum of 5! Are you ready?
forest.storyComplete: Fantastic! You've conquered Addition Forest and learned the Small Friends trick! Ahead is Subtraction Valley - where you'll learn how to make numbers smaller. Let's go! üèîÔ∏è

valley.name: Stage 3: Subtraction Valley
valley.subtitle: Learn subtraction & Small Friends
valley.description: Learn subtraction and Small Friends for subtraction!
valley.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've arrived at Subtraction Valley! üèîÔ∏è In this land, you'll learn how to make numbers smaller with subtraction. The Small Friends trick will help you here too! Let's explore!
valley.storyComplete: Excellent! You've conquered Subtraction Valley! Ahead is Big Friends Hill - hiding important secrets about the number 10. The journey is getting exciting! üåü

hill.name: Stage 4: Big Friends Hill
hill.subtitle: Secret of 10
hill.description: Learn the Big Friends formula - the key to calculating across 10!
hill.storyIntro: Welcome to Big Friends Hill! ‚≠ê This is where the most important secret lies: The Big Friends Formula - the key to calculating across 10! Once you master Big Friends, you can solve any calculation!
hill.storyComplete: Magnificent! You've mastered the Big Friends formula! This is a crucial milestone in your journey. Now head to the Combination Tower - where Small Friends and Big Friends will join forces! üèõÔ∏è

tower.name: Stage 5: Combination Tower
tower.subtitle: Small Friends + Big Friends
tower.description: Combine Small Friends and Big Friends to solve any calculation!
tower.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've climbed to Combination Tower! üèõÔ∏è Here, Small Friends and Big Friends will unite into a powerful force! When these two friends work together, no calculation is too difficult!
tower.storyComplete: Amazing! You've mastered the combination of Small Friends and Big Friends! Now head to the City of Big Numbers - where you'll conquer 2 and 3 digit numbers! üèôÔ∏è

city-numbers.name: Stage 6: City of Big Numbers
city-numbers.subtitle: 2-3 digit numbers
city-numbers.description: Conquer addition and subtraction with 2 and 3 digit numbers!
city-numbers.storyIntro: Welcome to the City of Big Numbers! üèôÔ∏è Here, 2 and 3 digit numbers live. You'll learn to add and subtract with tens and hundreds - essential skills for every mathematician!
city-numbers.storyComplete: Excellent! You've mastered the City of Big Numbers! Now enter the Kingdom of Thousands - where 4-digit numbers await the young hero! üëë

kingdom.name: Stage 7: Kingdom of Thousands
kingdom.subtitle: 4 digit numbers
kingdom.description: Conquer addition and subtraction with 4 digit numbers - the pinnacle of big numbers!
kingdom.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've arrived at the Kingdom of Thousands! üè∞ This is the kingdom of mighty thousand-numbers. Only the truly skilled can conquer this place. Are you ready for the challenge?
kingdom.storyComplete: Magnificent! You've become a master of the Kingdom of Thousands! But the journey doesn't end - the Wisdom Tower awaits you to learn the extraordinary skill: MENTAL MATH! üß†

mental-tower.name: Stage 8: Wisdom Tower (1 Digit)
mental-tower.subtitle: Basic Mental Math
mental-tower.description: Train Anzan - mental calculation with 1-digit numbers!
mental-tower.storyIntro: Welcome to the Wisdom Tower! üß† This is where you learn the magical skill: MENTAL MATH (Anzan)! Instead of using a physical abacus, you'll imagine the Soroban in your head. Let's start with 1-digit numbers!
mental-tower.storyComplete: Extraordinary! You've mastered 1-digit mental math! Now challenge the Advanced Wisdom Tower - 2-digit mental math. Do you dare? ‚ö°

mental-tower-advanced.name: Stage 9: Wisdom Tower (2 Digits)
mental-tower-advanced.subtitle: Advanced Mental Math
mental-tower-advanced.description: Mental calculation with 2-digit numbers - a higher realm!
mental-tower-advanced.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! Advanced Wisdom Tower! üß†‚ö° This is a higher realm of mental math. You'll calculate mentally with 2-digit numbers - only those with special intellect can do this!
mental-tower-advanced.storyComplete: Outstanding! You've reached the 2-digit mental math realm! Ahead is the Speed Temple - testing your reflexes and speed! Ready? üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

speed-temple.name: Stage 10: Speed Temple
speed-temple.subtitle: Time Challenge
speed-temple.description: Calculate with time limits - testing your reflexes! (Max 4 digits)
speed-temple.storyIntro: Speed Temple - where your reflex limits are tested!
speed-temple.storyComplete: Fast as lightning! You're ready for Candle Peak!

flash-peak-candle.name: Stage 11: Candle Peak
flash-peak-candle.subtitle: Flash 1 Digit
flash-peak-candle.storyIntro: Candle Peak - Flash Anzan with 1-digit numbers!
flash-peak-candle.storyComplete: Excellent! You've conquered Flash 1 digit. Moon Peak awaits!

flash-peak-moon.name: Stage 12: Moon Peak
flash-peak-moon.subtitle: Flash 2 Digits
flash-peak-moon.description: Flash Anzan Moon level - 2-digit numbers super fast!
flash-peak-moon.storyIntro: Moon Peak - Flash Anzan with 2-digit numbers super fast!
flash-peak-moon.storyComplete: LEGENDARY! You've conquered Flash Anzan! Treasure Castle awaits!

treasure-castle.name: DESTINATION: Treasure Castle
treasure-castle.subtitle: Receive Certificate!
treasure-castle.description: Defeat 3 Final Bosses to receive the Add & Sub Certificate!
treasure-castle.storyIntro: üéä Welcome to Treasure Castle - the destination of the Add & Sub journey!
treasure-castle.storyComplete: üéâüèÜ CONGRATULATIONS! You've earned the TREASURE and ADD & SUB MENTAL MATH CERTIFICATE! üèÜüéâ

mul-forest.name: Stage 1: Multiplication Forest
mul-forest.subtitle: Learn multiplication
mul-forest.description: Get familiar with multiplication on Soroban!
mul-forest.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! Welcome to Multiplication Forest! üå≤ Here, you'll learn the art of multiplication - when numbers multiply into larger numbers! Multiplication on Soroban is amazing!
mul-forest.storyComplete: Excellent! You've mastered basic multiplication! Ahead is Division Cliff - a new challenge awaits! üèîÔ∏è

div-cliff.name: Stage 2: Division Cliff
div-cliff.subtitle: Learn division
div-cliff.storyIntro: Welcome to Division Cliff! üèîÔ∏è Division is the art of splitting numbers into equal parts. Let's explore the mysterious world of division!
div-cliff.storyComplete: Fantastic! You've conquered Division Cliff! Ahead is the Mix Tower - where multiplication and division combine! üèõÔ∏è

mix-tower.name: Stage 3: Mix Tower
mix-tower.subtitle: Multiply √∑ Divide
mix-tower.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've arrived at Mix Tower! üèõÔ∏è Here, multiplication and division will randomly appear. Use all your skills to conquer this challenge!
mix-tower.storyComplete: Amazing! You've conquered Mix Tower! The Complete Certificate awaits at Master Peak! üèÜ

master-peak.name: Stage 4: Master Peak
master-peak.subtitle: All 4 operations
master-peak.description: Challenge all 4 operations: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division!
master-peak.storyIntro: Welcome to Master Peak! ‚õ∞Ô∏è This is the final challenge - where all 4 operations combine. You've come a long way, let's conquer this peak together!
master-peak.storyComplete: Incredible! You've conquered Master Peak! You truly are a Soroban Master! üéì

grand-castle.name: Stage 5: Grand Castle
grand-castle.subtitle: Complete Certificate
grand-castle.description: Receive the Complete Soroban Certificate - mastery of all operations!
grand-castle.storyIntro: Congratulations! Welcome to Grand Castle! üè∞ The Complete Soroban Certificate awaits you here. You've conquered the entire Treasure Quest!
grand-castle.storyComplete: Hoo hoo! Congratulations Soroban Master! You've earned the Complete Certificate - the highest recognition of Soroban mastery! üéâüèÜ

cave-multiply.name: Stage 1: Multiplication Cave
cave-multiply.subtitle: Times Tables
cave-multiply.description: Learn times tables and multiplication on Soroban!
cave-multiply.storyIntro: Multiplication Cave - where you learn to multiply numbers many times!
cave-multiply.storyComplete: Amazing! You've mastered multiplication. Division Lake awaits!

lake-divide-basic.name: Stage 2: Basic Division Lake
lake-divide-basic.subtitle: Divide by 2-7
lake-divide-basic.description: Learn basic division - dividing by small numbers!
lake-divide-basic.storyIntro: Basic Division Lake - where you learn to divide numbers into parts!
lake-divide-basic.storyComplete: Great! You've mastered basic division. Advanced Division Lake awaits!

lake-divide-advanced.name: Stage 3: Advanced Division Lake
lake-divide-advanced.subtitle: 2-digit Division
lake-divide-advanced.description: Divide by 8-9 and divide large numbers!
lake-divide-advanced.storyIntro: Advanced Division Lake - challenge with larger numbers!
lake-divide-advanced.storyComplete: Excellent! You've mastered Multiply and Divide. Four Operations Arena awaits!

arena-four.name: Stage 4: Four Operations Arena
arena-four.subtitle: All 4 Operations
arena-four.description: Practice and compete with all 4 operations!
arena-four.storyIntro: Four Operations Arena - challenge for champions!
arena-four.storyComplete: You've conquered Four Operations! Mental Math Tower awaits!

mental-muldiv.name: Stage 5: Mental Math Tower
mental-muldiv.subtitle: Anzan Mul Div
mental-muldiv.description: Mental calculation for Multiply & Divide without abacus!
mental-muldiv.storyIntro: Mental Math Tower - train Anzan for Multiply & Divide!
mental-muldiv.storyComplete: Extraordinary! You can mentally calculate Mul Div. Speed Temple awaits!

speed-muldiv.name: Stage 6: Speed Temple
speed-muldiv.subtitle: Super Speed Mul Div
speed-muldiv.description: Multiply and divide with time limits! (Max 4 digits)
speed-muldiv.storyIntro: Speed Temple - test your Mul Div speed!
speed-muldiv.storyComplete: Fast as lightning! Mixed Peak awaits!

mixed-peak.name: Stage 7: Mixed Peak
mixed-peak.subtitle: Perfect 4 Operations
mixed-peak.description: Mixed 4 operations at the highest level! (Max 4 digits)
mixed-peak.storyIntro: Mixed Peak - where 4 operations blend perfectly!
mixed-peak.storyComplete: Perfect! You're ready for the Supreme Castle!

supreme-castle.name: DESTINATION: Supreme Castle
supreme-castle.subtitle: Complete Certificate!
supreme-castle.description: Defeat 3 Final Bosses to receive the Complete Certificate!
supreme-castle.storyIntro: üëë Welcome to Supreme Castle - the pinnacle of Soroban!
supreme-castle.storyComplete: üéâüëëüèÜ CONGRATULATIONS! You've earned the COMPLETE SOROBAN CERTIFICATE! You are a MASTER! üèÜüëëüéâ

1b659a1c-1e19-4dab-aea6-c6f682357fe8.title: üéØ High Accuracy

theory: üî¥ Heaven bead (bead above the bar) has value = 5
üü° Earth beads (beads below the bar) have value = 1
üìè Beads are only counted when touching the bar
üëÜ Push Heaven bead down = add 5, push up = subtract 5
üëá Push Earth bead up = add 1, push down = subtract 1
practice: Try pushing 1 Earth bead up to the bar to make number 1!
Push 2 Earth beads up to the bar to make number 2!
Push 3 Earth beads up to the bar to make number 3!
Push 4 Earth beads up to the bar to make number 4!
Push Heaven bead down to the bar to make number 5!

theory: üü° **Earth beads** are the 4 beads below the bar
üìè Push Earth beads **up** to the bar = add that value
üìè Push Earth beads **down** away from bar = subtract that value
üî¥ **Heaven bead** is the single bead above the bar
üìè Push Heaven bead **down** to bar = add 5
üìè Push Heaven bead **up** away from bar = subtract 5
üí° Number 5 = only Heaven bead touching bar
üí° Number 10 = 1 Earth bead in Tens column
‚ú® Addition = Push more beads toward the bar
üí° Only works when you have enough Earth beads to push!
üî¥ When result ‚â• 5, use the Heaven bead
1Ô∏è‚É£ Enough Earth beads ‚Üí Push more Earth beads up
üåü SMALL FRIENDS are two numbers that add up to 5
üí° When not enough Earth beads to add, use Small Friends!
üéØ When out of Earth beads, use Small Friends formula:
üìå See +4 when have 1,2,3 Earth ‚Üí Push Heaven, remove 1
üìå See +3 when have 2,3,4 Earth ‚Üí Push Heaven, remove 2
üìå See +2 when have 3,4 Earth ‚Üí Push Heaven, remove 3
üéØ Goal: React instantly, no thinking needed!
‚ú® Subtraction = Push beads away from the bar
üëá Subtract Earth beads: Push Earth beads down (away from bar)
üëÜ Subtract Heaven bead: Push Heaven bead up (away from bar)
üî¢ Example: 4-2 = Have 4 Earth, push 2 down = 2 left
üí° Only works when you have enough beads to remove!
üéØ When not enough Earth beads to subtract, use Small Friends:
üìå See -4 when have Heaven ‚Üí Push Heaven up, add 1 Earth
üìå See -3 when have Heaven ‚Üí Push Heaven up, add 2 Earth
üìå See -2 when have Heaven ‚Üí Push Heaven up, add 3 Earth
üìå See -1 when have Heaven ‚Üí Push Heaven up, add 4 Earth
üåü BIG FRIENDS are two numbers that add up to 10
üéØ When adding goes past 9, carry to tens column!
‚ûï +9 = Add 1 ten, subtract Big Friend of 9 (+10-1)
‚ûï +8 = Add 1 ten, subtract Big Friend of 8 (+10-2)
‚ûï +7 = Add 1 ten, subtract Big Friend of 7 (+10-3)
üéØ When not enough beads to subtract, borrow from tens!
‚ûñ -9 = Borrow 1 ten, add Big Friend of 9 (-10+1)
‚ûñ -8 = Borrow 1 ten, add Big Friend of 8 (-10+2)
‚ûñ -7 = Borrow 1 ten, add Big Friend of 7 (-10+3)
Step 2: Need to borrow 10 ‚Üí Add 1 (tens column)
Step 3: Return Big Friend of 8 = 2 ‚Üí But 6 can't subtract 2
Step 4: Use combined: Subtract 5, add Small Friend of 2 = 3
üí° **TIP:** When can't subtract Big Friend, subtract 5 then add Small Friend
When subtracting but can't add Big Friend directly
Step 3: Add Big Friend of 8 = 2 ‚Üí But can't add 2
Step 4: Use combined: Add 5, subtract Small Friend of 2 = 3
üí° **TIP:** Subtract 8 = subtract 10, add 5, subtract 3 (Small Friend of 2)
‚Ä¢ Small Friends add: Subtract 5, add Small Friend
‚Ä¢ Big Friends add: Add 10, subtract Big Friend
‚Ä¢ Combined add: Add 10, subtract 5, add Small Friend
‚Ä¢ Simple subtract: Push beads away directly
‚Ä¢ Small Friends subtract: Add 5, subtract Small Friend
‚Ä¢ Big Friends subtract: Subtract 10, add Big Friend
‚Ä¢ Combined subtract: Subtract 10, add 5, subtract Small Friend
‚Ä¢ Add: Borrow larger number, return Friend
‚Ä¢ Subtract: Add Friend, return larger number
Look at number ‚Üí Identify which formula ‚Üí Execute
üìè Always calculate from RIGHT to LEFT (units first)
üìè When units column ‚â• 10, carry to tens!
üìè Subtraction also goes RIGHT to LEFT
üí° Read and push from LEFT to RIGHT!
üìè Still calculate from RIGHT to LEFT
üìè Subtract large numbers: careful when borrowing!
üí° Soroban can calculate very large numbers!
üéØ Each column works the same way
üìè Subtract large numbers: careful when borrowing!
üí° When borrowing across multiple places, subtract step by step
Process sequentially from right to left
üí° **TIP:** Break large numbers into easier parts
üîπ Multiply each digit from left to right
üîπ Add partial products to correct positions
üí° **TIP:** Memorize times tables for faster calculation!
üí° **TIP:** Multiply by 5 = multiply by 10 then divide by 2
üí° **TIP:** Sum of digits in 9's products always = 9
üîπ Add partial products to correct positions
üîπ Bring down next digit if needed
a √ó b = c  ‚Üî  c √∑ b = a  ‚Üî  c √∑ a = b
2. Multiply by 1 (tens of 14): 23 √ó 1 = 23 ‚Üí place in tens
‚Ä¢ Last digit √ó last digit gives last digit of result
üîπ Get quotient, subtract product, bring down next digit
üí° **TIP:** Division = reverse multiplication. Check by multiplying!
üí° **TIP:** Know times tables 6, 7 for faster division!
üîπ Add partial products to correct positions
üîπ Bring down next digit if needed
a √ó b = c  ‚Üî  c √∑ b = a  ‚Üî  c √∑ a = b
üîπ **Recognition:** Number divisible by 8 when last 3 digits divisible by 8
üîπ **Recognition:** Number divisible by 9 when digit sum divisible by 9
üí° **TIP:** Use divisibility rules for quick checks!
üí° **TIP:** Go slow for accuracy, then speed up!
üîπ **2-digit divisor:** Long division, step by step
‚Ä¢ Divisible by 3: digit sum divisible by 3
‚Ä¢ Divisible by 9: digit sum divisible by 9
üîπ Add partial products to correct positions
üîπ Bring down next digit if needed
a √ó b = c  ‚Üî  c √∑ b = a  ‚Üî  c √∑ a = b
üí° **TIP:** Check division result by multiplying back
- Anzan = mental math using virtual Soroban in your mind
- Visualize the abacus in your brain
- Multiply by 5 = divide by 2, multiply by 10
- Multiply by 4 = multiply by 2, then by 2 again
- a √∑ b = c means b √ó c = a
üéØ **GOAL:** Answer within 10 seconds, link to times tables
üéØ **GOAL:** Divide by 6-9: 10 sec, large numbers: 15 sec
You've mastered mental math in Level 15-16. Now it's time to **speed up**!
- Visualize the abacus instantly in your mind
- 5 is the "anchor point" - add/subtract through 5 is faster
- Practice 5-10 minutes daily to build reflexes
Times tables must be **memorized like reflexes**!
Division is **reverse multiplication**. Know times tables = divide fast!
**Flash Anzan** starts with simple number memory!
- Number appears for **2 seconds** (decreasing to 1 second)
- You type the number you just saw
- Say number silently in your head to reinforce
This is the first step of **real Flash Anzan**!
- Numbers appear one by one (1.5 seconds each)
- ADD UP in your head as you watch
- Visualize: Push beads UP (add) or DOWN (subtract)
- Each number shows for only **0.8-1 second**
- Don't read the number - SEE THE IMAGE on the abacus
- Move beads in your head with each number
- Read result from final mental image
Welcome to the **peak of Flash Anzan**!
- Each number shows for only **0.5-0.7 seconds**
- No more thinking - just SEE and KNOW
- Persistent practice will get you there!
